亅字的基本解释

亅
jué
钩子。

亅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jué］
［《廣韻》其月切，入月，羣。］
钩子，下端向上弯曲的器物。《说文·亅部》：“亅，鉤逆者謂之亅。”今用作汉字笔画之一，称“竖钩”。

亅字的康熙字典解释

【子集上】【亅字部】　亅； 康熙笔画：1； 页码：页85第09
【廣韻】【集韻】?其月切，音橜。【說文】鉤逆者謂之亅。象形。凡亅之屬皆从亅。讀若橜。

A
Basic explanation of words
A
jué
hook.
A
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jué］
["Guangyun" its month cut, enter the month, group. ]
Hook, an object with the lower end bent upward. "Shuowen·Qibu": "Qi, the one who is inverse is called "Qi"." It is now used as one of the strokes of Chinese characters and is called "Hook".
A
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset Part 1] [Family Character Department] 　亅; Kangxi Strokes: 1; Page Number: Page 85 No. 09
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Its moon cut, sound 橜. [Speaking of the text] The person who is rebellious is said to be the same. Pictogram. All subordinates are subordinate to subordinates. Read Ruo Xun.
A
